goal.objective: Complete DealershipAI dashboard to 100% production readiness and deploy to api.dealershipai.com
successCriteria: Deployed to Vercel with custom domains
constraints: No breaking changes to existing features
Use existing tech stack (Next.js 14, Supabase, Clerk)

tasks.title: Resolve Build Errors
tasks.description: Identify and fix all build errors in the Next.js project to ensure the application compiles and runs without issues.

tasks.title: Configure Production Supabase Database
tasks.description: Set up and configure the Supabase database for production environment, ensuring all tables, schemas, and data integrity are maintained.

tasks.title: Setup Production Clerk Authentication
tasks.description: Configure Clerk authentication for the production environment, ensuring all authentication flows work as expected.

tasks.title: Deploy to Vercel with Custom Domains
tasks.description: Deploy the application to Vercel and configure it to use the custom domain api.dealershipai.com.

tasks.title: Implement API Endpoints
tasks.description: Create and test all necessary API endpoints, ensuring they are functional and meet the application's requirements.

tasks.title: Enable Monitoring and Analytics
tasks.description: Integrate monitoring and analytics tools to track application performance and user engagement.

tasks.title: Perform Security Hardening
tasks.description: Enhance security measures by implementing best practices and conducting a security review.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Optimize the application to ensure page loads in under 2 seconds by improving code efficiency and resource management.

tasks.title: Conduct Smoke Tests
tasks.description: Run smoke tests to validate that the core functionalities of the application work as expected.

tasks.title: Complete Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the application setup, deployment, and usage to ensure ease of maintenance and onboarding.
